item.title: Republican interim SEC chief Mark Uyeda cast the sole vote against suing Musk
item.description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's five commissioners held a closed-door vote on whether to sue Elon Musk.

item.title: Concerns about espionage rise as Trump and Musk fire thousands of federal workers
item.description: As Trump and Musk work to overhaul the federal government, they're forcing out thousands of workers with insider knowledge and connections who now nee...

item.title: Political and financial turmoil set to dominate Turkey, risking economic stabilization plans
item.description: "Once again, President Erdogan's political agenda has inflicted serious damage on Turkey's economic outlook," one analyst note read.

item.title: Former Utah Rep. Mia Love, the first Black Republican woman elected to U.S. House, has died
item.description: Former U.S. Rep. Mia Love of Utah, a daughter of Haitian immigrants who became the first Black Republican woman elected to Congress, died Sunday.

item.title: Pro-Trump senator meets Chinese Premier Li with U.S. executives
item.description: U.S. Republican Senator Steve Daines met Chinese Premier Li Qiang in Beijing with a group of seven American executives on Sunday.
